attributes.action: Allow NHS workers to park for free at hospitals to avoid public transport
attributes.additional_details: This would mean that staff would be able to social distance themselves more from catching or spreading the Coronavirus. This would also mean staff could get to work a lot quicker not having to rely on public transport.
attributes.background: Allowing NHS workers to park for free at hospitals would mean staff wouldn’t be forced to take public transport during COVID-19 which would lower the risk of spreading the virus.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
